title: AITA: Is She An A*Hole For Correcting Her Coworker About Where Milk Comes From?
description:
Every week we dive DEEP into the AITA (Am I The A*hole) thread on Reddit, and it’s FASCINATING.
It’s a bunch of real-life scenarios people are in where they could EASILY be the a*hole, but maybe – just maybe – once you hear all the details, you’ll understand it a little better and they won’t be SO much of an a*hole! Or maybe not.
Up today: Where do you think chocolate milk comes from? In this woman's case, her coworker legit thought it only came from brown cows. She corrected her but got in trouble at work because of it. Does this make her an a*hole?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
